item.title: 巴西国家石油公司应对全球石油供应过剩的办法是抽取更多原油
item.description: 巴西的国有控股能源公司有一个简单的公式来度过当前石油市场的供应过剩：泵出更多的原油。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled energy company has a simple formula for steering through the current oil market glut: pump more crude.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 同意以 12.3 亿美元收购 Verint
item.description: Thoma Bravo 已同意以 12.3 亿美元现金收购 Verint Systems Inc.【原文：Thoma Bravo has agreed to buy Verint Systems Inc. for $1.23 billion in cash as the private equity firm builds out its software portfolio.】

item.title: 据说三菱即将投资富勒顿健康公司
item.description: 知情人士透露，三菱商事即将投资新加坡医院运营商富勒顿健康公司（Fullerton Health），这家日本公司正寻求在东南亚扩张。【原文：Mitsubishi Corp. is nearing an investment in Singapore-based hospital operator Fullerton Health, people with knowledge of the matter said, as the Japanese firm seeks to expand in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 沙特 Humain 公司推出具有 "伊斯兰 "价值观的阿拉伯语聊天机器人
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯领先的人工智能公司 Humain 推出了一款面向阿拉伯人和穆斯林的人工智能对话应用程序，以寻求在该技术领域的地区领导地位。【原文：Humain, Saudi Arabia’s leading artificial intelligence company, has launched a conversational AI app for Arabs and Muslims as the kingdom seeks regional leadership in the technology.】

item.title: 现在美国的 ETF 数量超过了个股数量
item.description: ETF 的蓬勃发展使全美投资民主化，但这股热潮正达到一个临界点。投资者和财务顾问有太多的基金可供选择。【原文：The ETF boom that has democratized investing across America is reaching a tipping point. Investors and financial advisers have too many funds to choose from.】

item.title: 预测市场 Kalshi 聘请影响力人士 John Wang 领导加密货币推进工作
item.description: Kalshi Inc.聘请了从加密货币创始人转行成为影响力人物的约翰-王（John Wang），因为该预测市场正努力加深与数字资产世界的联系。【原文：Kalshi Inc. hired John Wang, a crypto-founder-turned-influencer, as the prediction marketplace seeks to deepen its ties in the digital-asset world.】

item.title: 伊兹密尔港谈判失败后土耳其转向当地投资者
item.description: 六个月前，向阿拉伯联合酋长国 AD 港口集团出售爱琴海港口经营权的谈判破裂，土耳其正将目光转向当地投资者。【原文：Turkey is turning its focus to local investors after talks to sell operating rights for an Aegean port to the United Arab Emirates’ AD Ports Group collapsed six months ago.】

item.description: Cineplex Inc. 的最大股东之一正在敦促这家加拿大连锁影院公司采取措施回购股票、出售非核心资产并为彻底出售做准备，认为其股价可能会上涨近三倍。【原文：One of the largest shareholders of Cineplex Inc. is pressing the Canadian theater chain to initiate measures to buy back shares, sell non-core assets and prepare for an outright sale, arguing the stock could nearly triple.】

item.title: 中国火锅连锁店 "海底捞 "销售额因食客退缩而下降
item.description: 中国连锁火锅店海蒂乐国际控股有限公司（Haidilao International Holding Ltd.）报告称，由于经济放缓，消费者越来越倾向于选择更便宜的食品，该公司的销售额连续第二次下降。【原文：Chinese hotpot restaurant chain Haidilao International Holding Ltd. reported a second consecutive drop in sales as consumers increasingly turned to cheaper food options in a slowing economy.】

item.title: 克莱格称硅谷的羊群行为使其倾向特朗普
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，莱利-格里芬（Riley Griffin）和库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）在 58 岁的前 Meta 高管尼克-克莱格（Nick Clegg）的新书发布前，与他畅谈了离开公司的原因以及硅谷和华盛顿的融合。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Riley Griffin and Kurt Wagner chat with former Meta executive Nick Clegg, 58, about why he left the company and the convergence of Silicon Valley and Washington, ahead of his new book’s launch.】

item.title: 垃圾股收益率跌至 40 个月低点 助推 5 月以来最佳涨幅
item.description: 美国垃圾债券收益率周五跌至40个月新低，创下近三个月来最佳单日涨幅，此前美联储主席鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，美联储对在下次会议上降息持开放态度，并将焦点转向劳动力市场的下行风险而非通胀的上行风险。【原文：US junk bond yields plunged to a new 40-month low on Friday, spurring the best one-day gains in nearly three months after Chair Jerome Powell signaled that the Fed is open to a rate cut in the next meeting, shifting focus to downside risks to the labor market rather than upside risk to inflation.】

item.title: 历峰集团在香港开设专卖店，将意大利珠宝品牌推向亚洲
item.description: 瑞士奢侈品巨头历峰集团（Richemont）新近收购的意大利珠宝品牌 Vhernier 即将在香港开店，从而扩大其在亚洲的业务。【原文：Swiss luxury giant Richemont is expanding its newly acquired Italian jewelry brand Vhernier in Asia with an upcoming store in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 土耳其将终止对投资者卖空股票的禁令
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，土耳其官员正计划让自 3 月起实施的卖空禁令在本月底到期，以提高股市对外国投资者的吸引力。【原文：Turkish officials are planning to let a short-selling ban that’s been in place since March expire at the end of the month in an effort to boost the stock market’s appeal to foreign investors, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 人工智能颠覆恐惧引发投资者对软件股的关注
item.description: 多年来，软件公司一直是华尔街的宠儿。高利润率、低资本要求和巨大的增长空间，促使风险投资家马克-安德森（Marc Andreessen）在 2011 年发表了著名的 "软件正在吞噬世界 "的宣言。【原文：For years software companies were the toast of Wall Street. High profit margins, low capital requirements and vast runway for growth prompted the venture capitalist Marc Andreessen in 2011 to famously declare “software is eating the world.”】

item.title: 赢得 300 兆瓦印度涡轮机订单后，阿达尼风电公司放眼海外
item.description: 据一位高层管理人员透露，阿达尼集团的风力涡轮机制造部门本月赢得了印度 304 兆瓦产能的订单，其目标是向全球电力生产商供应清洁能源发电设备。【原文：Adani Group’s wind turbine manufacturing division has won orders for 304 megawatts of capacity from India this month, and is aiming to supply clean-energy generating machines to power producers globally, according to a top executive.】

item.title: 菲律宾政府停工，首都学校周二停课
item.description: 菲律宾内政部在 Facebook 上发布消息称，由于天气恶劣，菲律宾将于周二暂停首都地区各级政府的工作和课程。【原文：The Philippines will suspend on Tuesday government work and classes at all levels in the capital region due to inclement weather, the interior department says in a Facebook post.】

item.title: 尽管唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战，加拿大人仍热衷于购买美股
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税、吞并威胁和各种侮辱激怒了加拿大人，导致他们抛售美国房地产和抵制美国产品。加拿大的投资者似乎从未收到过这样的备忘录。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s tariffs, threats of annexation and assorted insults have infuriated Canadians, leading them to sell off American real estate and boycott products. The nation’s investors seemingly never got the memo.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦和孟加拉国在罕见的双边会晤中加强关系
item.description: 巴基斯坦和孟加拉国在巴基斯坦首席外交官 13 年来首次访问孟加拉之后，誓言要加大努力，增加双边贸易、投资和互联互通。【原文：Pakistan and Bangladesh vowed to spur efforts to increase bilateral trade, investment and connectivity after the first visit by Pakistan’s chief diplomat in 13 years.】

item.title: 混乱的贸易被认为显示了印度区块链系统的弱点
item.description: 上周的大宗交易失误是印度多年来最严重的交易失误之一，暴露了该国大宗股票买卖系统的潜在弱点。【原文：Last week’s big trading blunder, one of India’s worst in years, is exposing a potential weakness in the country’s system for buying and selling large blocks of shares.】

item.title: 面对美国风力发电场停建，Equinor 向 Orsted 提供见解
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的政府下令停止在美国一个几乎完工的海上风电场的建设后，持有Orsted A/S公司10%股份的挪威能源公司Equinor ASA正在与这家丹麦风电开发商分享经验教训。【原文：Equinor ASA, the Norwegian energy company that owns a 10% holding in Orsted A/S, is sharing lessons-learned with the Danish wind developer after President Donald Trump’s administration ordered construction halted on an almost-finished offshore wind farm in the US.】

item.title: 德国商业前景意外创 2022 年以来新高
item.description: 在欧盟与美国达成贸易协议后，德国企业的信心出人意料地提高到了 2022 年以来的最高点，尽管有些企业批评美国提高关税。【原文：Confidence among German firms unexpectedly improved to the highest since 2022 after the European Union struck a trade deal with the US, despite some criticizing higher tariffs.】
